channel.title: Systems on Nortrup in Development
channel.description: Recent content in Systems on Nortrup in Development

item.title: The Product Management System
item.description: I’m in the midst of reading Thinking in Systems: A Primer (affiliate link) to my list of recommended reads for Product Managers. It is one of those books like Principals of Product Development Flow that show you why things work at a deeper systemic level that you’ve just been emersed in.  It’s a book that points out the water for the fishes.
